tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I will surely suggest Dr. Krishna Sha's name *** *** **** ************ ** ********** I have known her for more than 7years now. I had consulted this doctor for PCOD and thyroid hormone related abnormalities. With her proper guidance,my hormone abnormalities were treated successfully. I am very much satisfied with this doctors treatment and because of the trust I have in this doctor,I decided to consult her during my pregnancy period. Though I am from Kerala, my delivery wss done by Dr.Krishna Sha because of the trust I had in this doctor. She is a very experienced and sincere doctor. She explains all about the disease and treatment very well. She has time to answer to our queries and is never in a haste. The most important thing which I liked about this doctor is her calm manner. She never gives us stress nor scares us...be how serious the problem. This surely increases our confidence and positivity. I had recommended this doctor to my neighbour as well and she is also satisfied with this doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I strongly recommend Dr Krishna Shaw!  I have never encountered a doctor with such knowledge and talent that absolutely loves what she is doing and cares so deeply for her patients. During this challenging pandemic times I was very fortunate to have her as my doctor during my delivery. She is throughly experienced in handling and performing complicated deliveries with ease. Thank you very much Doctor!!

tags: None
review:
This is my first and very bad experience from starting to 9 months with Dr. Krishna Shaw. I met with this doctor for my wife’s pregnancy. I thought she is very experience lady doctor she would care very proper way.
But I am very unhappy with this doctor because of bellow reason.
1.	She is very unprofessional and very rude behavior.
****** ** ***** ******* ****** if you would ask any doubt via phone call or message then she will say come with video appointment and that is chargeable, she will not reply without appointment.
3.	If you are visiting with appointment and planning to ask any normal doubt then be ready, she may scold you like “Don’t ask silly question otherwise she will blast on you”.
4.	She will never suggest you what should you do for normal delivery only she will write medicine and normal checkup and then you can go that’s it.

***** *** *** ********** **** **** ****** *** ******** ** ******** **** ******* **** ******* ****** ** ******* **** ** ******** ********** **** **** ****** **** **** * ******* She is very rude lady *** *** ** *** ***** ** ******* *** *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ***** *** **** **** *** *** * ** **** ** ** ***** she does not explain whats wrong with d patient, she only writes ** scannings and tells u to leave..even if u ask what is the issue she says u do scannings only then will tell****** ****** **** ****.pls dont go to her..dont spend your of time and money..

tags: None
review: Really good experience. In this modern day, there are very few doctors who would dedicate 7 days a week for their profession and she is one among them. My wife had a miscarriage few years back and how doctor Krishna Shaw managed the entire ordeal and how sensitive she was to my wife about even very trivial things helped us a long way in sailing through those rough days in our life.

tags: None
review: She is a very approachable doc, listens to understand issues, asks relevant questions to make diagnosis. Is very practical in her communication and explains issues in detail. I have had my first child and a major operation done for my mother under her able hands. She made herself reachable directly with no time constraints when we were under her care. Highly recommend her.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had a very good experience with Dr Krishna Shaw. She listens & understands patients problem well. the first time me and my husband met her we knew we were in expert hands.I have been consulting her since my first delivery and continuing for any gynaec issues. She provides unbiased advices and always suggests to go for a natural delivery.
 I am always thankful to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We had a very good experience with Dr. Krishna Shaw. She listens and understand patient problem and doesn't give unnecessary medicine. She provides unbiased advices and always suggest to go for natural delivery. She is very punctual and empathetic towards patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Krishna Shaw is very excellent doctor.
She had guided me very well from the beginning of pregnancy till my normal delivery.
During my delivery she helped me with choosing the right place for delivery and stayed there for half of the day and kept me pushing for a normal delivery.
She is not at all behind money and helps her patient with all kind of support.she. She Will take your calls and will guide you whenever required.
Thanks Mam .

tags: None
review: Doctor is not satisfactory. The way she deals with a patient is not good at all. She does not explains the problems. After the visit was over, went to ask one small thing and she was irritated and responded very rudely. I will not recommend this doctor to anyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: If you are a youth with doubts of pregnancy with your partner. She will clear all of them. Doctor has experience *** ********** Don't Google things, it will give wrong information. Directly visit the doctor for correct advice

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had three miscarriages and was very upset. Due to Dr krishna Shaw care and treatment now I am blessed with a baby. She is very experienced, picks up calls, available on Sunday also. Hard to find such a doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Krishna Shaw was rude with an unpleasant attitude and prescribed tablets without even checking the  report. Please save your time and money and visit some other plac* ** *** **** **** ********** This doctor seems least interested in treating the patient and more interested in prescribing medication. Had a really bad experience with this doctor and would not recommend anyone to visit her.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Please do not visit this lady Dr.Krishna Shaw for any reason.She has a very unprofessional attitude as she postponed twice a procedure which  she was supposed to perform and also held back few important information that I should be informed of before hand which left me with no choice in the end moment but to undergo that procedure.The way she spoke was so disrespectful and also  her service charges are way too high.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: *** ******* **** ** **** ************* *** gives the apt medicines for the medical conditions of the patient. I highly recommend her for pregnancy related consultations. It is very difficult to find a doctor who's not money minded these days and she's really living it up to her noble profession! Consulting her since 3 years, very happy and lucky to have found her. Please go to her without any second thought. :) Good luck.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: she is very good and explains everything in detail.she is very polite and patient.she is well experienced and good.

review: Wonderful doctor, we had a very complicated pregnancy, if she wasnt there we cant imagine the successfull delivery of our baby, doctor is very polite and friendly.

tags: None
review: Thank you Mam, you are a good human being. She used to listen every problem and gives proper solution. We are very much happy, that we met the nicest person in my life .

review: Calm Doctor. Explained in detail. Suggested home remedies too. This is the second time I am consulting her.

review: Very long waiting time, no satisfaction of treatment. No breakup for payment. For a single scan they charge 1500 rs. I wouldn't recommend this hospital. Doctor's approach may be good *** *** ******** ** **** ******

review: First time seeing a doctor here in India was a great experience Dr Krishna is lovely and gave good advice, I was seen straight away and left with what I needed thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Doctor could have listened to the patient issues more kindly and could have shared contact number as I traveled almost 20 km to attend her appointment so it's not possible for me to travel frequently and get to see her every 10-15 days time.
